attributes.action: Make it illegal for a teacher/tutor to say no for a child to go to the toilet.
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair , unacceptable and cruel that teachers are allowed to say no for a student to go to the toilet.The amount of problems this has caused is ridiculous.
attributes.background: It should be illegal for a teacher to say no to a child if they need to go to the toilet.As a young girl who has cried to their teacher to let them go to the toilet I find it unacceptable that it’s legal for a teacher to say no.They should say yes even if you don’t have a toilet pass.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for a similar action:

Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422

Give students a legal right to access school toilets when they have their period:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637669
